body: Bruh why does he even put up with that much shit ? Just keeps getting worse and worse, just kill the mc off let the dude rest

I can't figure out why there are so many negative comments here? Like, if you guys don't like it, why bothering to read all the six parts of the story??? Some people get off on this shit, and that's meant for them, so just don't read the things you don't like? Seriously, it's so dumb, I personally think this is a masterpiece, and it's become one of my favourite works, but I do understand must of the people won't get off being cuckolded... but if they don't, then why reading this??? please, the title says "my first cuckold training" so how dumb do you have to be to start reading it and complain about it being about cuckolding?
